product_name: Serfas Lycra Dual Density Saddle - Women's
long_description: Cyclists who seek out a tough ride shouldn't have to put up with a rough ride: this Serfas Lycra Dual Density women's saddle absorbs the bumps. Dual Density base technology absorbs shock and allows the base to flex in critical areas. Soft open-cell padding is bonded to denser closed-cell foam to provide a firm foundation to support weight on longer rides. A top layer of Reactive Gel adds additional comfort. Deep groove design maximizes soft tissue protection and alleviates pelvic discomfort. Designed for women, with a slightly wider back to accommodate wider pelvic bones and a slightly shorter nose.
short_description: Cyclists who seek out a tough ride shouldn't have to put up with a rough ride: this Serfas Lycra Dual Density women's saddle absorbs the bumps.
